TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit ScriptResourceAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class ScriptResourceAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class ScriptResourceAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 在程序集内定义要从客户端脚本文件使用的资源。

span.span: Defines a resource in an assembly to be used from a client script file.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类仅在程序集声明中使用时才有效。The class is valid only when you use it in assembly declarations. 使用它可以在程序集中启用指定的嵌入脚本资源。You use it to enable a specified embedded script resource in an assembly. 您可以定义嵌入脚本库的名称、脚本库的资源文件的名称以及用于检索资源值的脚本文件中使用的名称。You can define the name of the embedded script library, the name of the resource file for the script library, and the name that is used in a script file for retrieving the resource values. 类使用中的属性为脚本库确定正确的资源名称。 The class uses the properties in to determine the correct resource name for a script library. 属性用于指定资源的资源键。The property is used with a resource key to specify a resource. > [!NOTE] > 类只能用于识别 JavaScript 文件的基于文本的资源。The class can be used only to identify text-based resources for JavaScript files. 若要将本地化的图像 (二进制) 文件与特定的区域性关联, 请考虑将其 URL 仅存储为本地化资源, 然后在脚本中对其进行解析和加载。To associate a localized image (binary) file with a particular culture, consider storing only its URL as a localized resource, which then be resolved and loaded in script. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个名为 CheckAnswer 的脚本文件的属性, 该文件使用 VerificationResources 资源文件中的资源。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 该名称`Answer`用于引用这些资源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何使用客户端脚本中的资源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 资源键 (`Correct`和`Incorrect`) 带有`Answer`前缀以标识包含这些值的脚本资源定义。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]

span.span: Gets the name of the script library.
The name of the script library.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个名为 CheckAnswer 的脚本文件的属性, 该文件使用 VerificationResources 资源文件中的资源。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 该名称`Answer`用于引用这些资源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. 在此示例中, 属性返回 "LocalizingResources. CheckAnswer"。In this example, the property returns "LocalizingResources.CheckAnswer.js". [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何使用客户端脚本中的资源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 资源键 (`Correct`和`Incorrect`) 带有`Answer`前缀以标识包含这些值的脚本资源定义。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]

VerificationResources"。In this example, the property returns "LocalizingResources.VerificationResources". 定义时不包含文件扩展名。The file name extension is not included when you define the . summary.span: 获取可在检索资源文件中的值时所使用的名称。

span.span: Gets the name that is used when retrieving the values in the resource file.

value.span: 检索资源文件中的值时客户端脚本中所使用的名称。

span.span: The name that is used in client script when retrieving the values in the resource file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含用于在客户端脚本中检索本地化资源的值。The property contains the value that is used for retrieving localized resources in client script. 客户端脚本必须包含要本地化的资源的值和密钥名称。The client script must include the value and the key name for the resource to be localized. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了一个名为 CheckAnswer 的脚本文件的属性, 该文件使用 VerificationResources 资源文件中的资源。The following example shows a attribute for a script file named CheckAnswer.js that uses resources from the VerificationResources resource files. 该名称`Answer`用于引用这些资源。The name `Answer` is used to reference these resources. 在此示例中, 属性返回 "解答"。In this example, the property returns "Answer". [!code-csharp[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/AssemblyInfo.cs#3)] [!code-vb[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/vb/AssemblyInfo.vb#3)] 下面的示例演示如何使用客户端脚本中的资源。The following example shows how to use the resources in client script. 资源键 (`Correct`和`Incorrect`) 带有`Answer`前缀以标识包含这些值的脚本资源定义。The resource keys (`Correct` and `Incorrect`) are prefixed with `Answer` to identify the script resource definition that contains the values. [!code-javascript[LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/LocalizingClientResourcesWalkthrough/cs/CheckAnswer.js#1)]
